explains: adj. 引人注目的；耀眼的；显著的

sentences.en: The eye-catching advertisements will trap us into buying things that we actually don't need.
sentences.cn: 这些引人注目的广告会让我们买一些实际上我们并不需要的东西。

sentences.en: The most eye-catching idea of all is suggested by Professor Roger Angel of the University of Arizona.
sentences.cn: 其中最引人注目的想法是由亚利桑那大学的罗杰·安吉尔教授提出的。

sentences.en: Beware: these eye-catching anemones have venom in their tentacles, which they use to stun and capture their prey.
sentences.cn: 要当心：这些引人注目的海葵的触手上有毒液，它们就是用这个来使猎物昏迷从而捕捉到猎物的。
